decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing various creatures and spells with specific abilities to create a synergistic combo that allows for massive damage output and control over the game. By ramping up mana with Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga, while also utilizing cards like Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker to control the board, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Emrakul, the Promised End serves as a powerful finisher, while cards like Devourer of Destiny and Kozilek's Command provide additional utility and flexibility to ensure victory.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while also maintaining a strong aggressive presence. By utilizing a mix of removal spells, protection spells, and evasive creatures, it aims to control the board and chip away at the opponent's life total. Additionally, the deck includes enchantment creatures to take advantage of synergies with various enchantments in the deck. Overall, the key strategy of this Aggro - Death And Taxes deck is to create a disruptive and aggressive game plan that can quickly overwhelm the opponent.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of aggressive creatures, burn spells, and support cards to apply pressure on the opponent and quickly close out the game. By curving out with fast creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, while using cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge for direct damage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their own game plan. Additionally, cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Static Prison provide additional utility and disruption to help secure victories.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Power Plant, and Mine) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. It utilizes control elements such as Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain to disrupt the opponent's strategy while using cards like Ugin, Eye of the Storms and Walking Ballista to control the board. The deck also includes cards like Ancient Stirrings and Expedition Map to help find key pieces of the combo and maintain consistency. Ultimately, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats and disruptive spells.

The main idea of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast creatures and instant spells. By utilizing cards like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment, the deck aims to quickly deal damage to the opponent's creatures and eventually lead to a decisive victory. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide powerful support and buffs for the creatures, while Ephemerate and Solitude offer protection and removal options. The deck also includes some land manipulation with cards like Windswept Heath and Arid Mesa to ensure a smooth mana base for aggressive plays.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells, while also utilizing creatures and planeswalkers to control the board and generate card advantage. Key cards include Counterspell, Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, Teferi, Time Raveler, Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, and Quantum Riddler. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent by efficiently dealing with threats and answering key spells, ultimately grinding out a win through incremental advantages and card advantage.

The main concept of this UrzaTron control deck is to ramp up mana quickly using Urza's Tower, Urza's Power Plant, and Urza's Mine in order to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. The deck also includes various control elements such as All Is Dust, Karn, the Great Creator, and Thought-Knot Seer to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats while controlling the board and mana resources.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands to generate a large amount of mana quickly, allowing for powerful plays with Eldrazi creatures and Karn, the Great Creator. It uses cards like Expedition Map and Mind Stone to search for the necessary lands and ramp up mana production. The deck includes control elements such as Thought-Knot Seer and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, it uses powerful Eldrazi creatures like Devourer of Destiny and Sire of Seven Deaths to apply pressure and win the game.

The deck focuses on aggressive play with a mix of disruptive elements. It aims to control the opponent's hand with discard spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, while also clearing the way with removal like Fatal Push. The creatures in the deck are powerful beaters like Emperor of Bones and Nethergoyf, backed up by Eldrazi threats like Thought-Knot Seer. The deck also includes graveyard hate with cards like Nihil Spellbomb and disruption like Pithing Needle. The mana base is fine-tuned to support the aggressive game plan with Eldrazi Temple and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth, as well as utility from Urza's Saga.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Broodscale Bloodchief's ability to empower creatures whenever a land is sacrificed. By combining creatures with sacrifice effects and land ramp, the deck aims to quickly ramp up mana and create a powerful board presence. The inclusion of Eldrazi and artifact support cards like Urza's Saga further enhances the deck's ability to generate value and overwhelm opponents. Utilizing a mix of sacrifice, ramp, and powerful creatures, this deck is designed to create explosive turns and outpace opponents in the Modern format.

The main focus of this deck is to swarm the board with cheap artifacts and creatures, using cards like Memnite and Pinnacle Emissary to quickly build a strong board presence. The deck also utilizes cards like Springleaf Drum and Mox Opal to generate mana efficiently, allowing for explosive turns. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke provide the deck with some removal and disruption options. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive game plan centered around Affinity for artifacts.

The main focus of this deck is to generate a powerful combo using cards like Blazing Broodscale, Glaring Fleshraker, and Malevolent Rumble to overwhelm the opponent with a strong board presence. The deck also includes cards like Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga to ramp up and play big threats like Emrakul, the Promised End. Additionally, the deck utilizes cards like Kozilek's Command and Devourer of Destiny to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of cards like Cavern of Souls and Boseiju, Who Endures helps ensure that crucial spells resolve efficiently.

The deck focuses on creating a fast, powerful combo without relying on traditional land cards. By utilizing a mix of creatures, instants, and artifacts, the player can quickly assemble key pieces like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom to deliver a knockout blow to the opponent. Cards like Thundertrap Trainer and Hydroelectric Specimen provide extra utility and support for the combo, while counterspells like Stern Scolding and Jwari Disruption help protect against disruption. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a game-winning combo that can come together with lightning speed.

This Death and Taxes Aggro deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while quickly putting pressure on them with aggressive creatures. By using cards like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to temporarily exile threats, and Thoughtseize to disrupt their hand, you can slow down their game plan while building up your own board presence. Quantum Riddler and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd provide additional disruption and protection for your creatures. Solitude and Skyclave Apparition offer removal options while Overlord of the Balemurk and Godless Shrine provide mana acceleration. This deck aims to control the game while quickly closing out the match.

This deck focuses on aggressively disrupting the opponent's gameplan while applying pressure with efficient creatures. By utilizing a mix of removal spells, enchantments, and powerful creatures like Solitude and Phelia, the deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent. Cards like Ephemerate and Sanctifier en-Vec provide additional utility and protection, allowing for flexibility in different matchups. The deck's strategy revolves around maintaining board presence, disrupting opponent's resources, and overwhelming them with a combination of creatures and removal spells.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells to control the battlefield and deal damage quickly to the opponent. The key strategy is to play creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury early on, while using cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge to remove threats and push through damage. The deck also includes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Thraben Charm to provide additional support and utility. By maintaining pressure and control, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.
